name: Camp Buddy: Scoutmasters Season
summary: Two Character Routes With multiple character choices and endings, you are in charge of the story! And all the choices you make in the game will affect how Yoshinori’s adventure will unfold! Each character route has an average of 25 full hours of gameplay! And that’s only for achieving one kind of ending! Unlock all endings to get the most out of the game! Get engaged with over 60+ unlockable CG Sets in the gallery for your own viewing pleasure! And that’s not to mention the more than 60+ mini images and background art! The game features 32 original compositions and fully-voiced cutscenes by various talented actors who help the player feel more connected to the characters and the story! Enjoy more than 30 hand-picked sex scenes throughout the game. See your favorite characters come to life in these intimate moments! Help Yoshinori recall events from his past alongside Hyunjin, and view special memories! You can also earn badges that you can use to unlock exciting content in the gallery! Finish the game once and unlock a secret room that lets you dress up the characters, view the opening video, and listen to in-game music! (Hint: The tent looks roomy)
